reviewText: Really well made.  My hubby loves it.
This is a great umbrella! Very light, very sturdy, opens and closes easily. A real value.

This is a very nice and high quality umbrella!  For this quality umbrella all I want to say in this review is the phrase One and done.  What is this simple yet intriguing phrase this crazy guy is saying one and done you ask?  One and done is the simple catch phrase that describes my philosophy when it comes to buying new items that I plan to actually use to make life easier.  Well at least that is my philosophical goal because it doesn't always happen.  Let me explain.  Whenever possible I try to buy a product that lasts so I just buy it once and I don't have to buy it again.  This Sevitti Umbrella would qualify as a one and done product in my view. In my experience this Sevitti Travel is the perfect most ultimate umbrella for someone who wants quality and usability.  First off it is loaded with quality and it is loaded with nice features.  This thing is robust.  It is super strong. Everything about it is quality.  I remember one time using a cheaper umbrella and a big gust of wind came along and destroyed it.  I really don't think that would happen to this umbrella due to the high quality of its build and materials.  When I first took it out of its package I was like "wow, cool".  The really cool thing about this umbrella is the push button open and push button close. I have a 2 year old son and it has been raining allot lately.  When I take my son out to the car in the rain of course I use an umbrella.  The problem with a normal umbrella is that it takes two hands to close it.  With this umbrella all it takes is a push of a button.  When you first start when the umbrella is closed you push the button and it opens completely with no further action on your part.  When you are done and ready to put the umbrella away you just push the same button and it collapse at the top.  You then push the telescoping rod back it its original configuration and then wrap it closed.  I recommend letting it dry out before putting it back in to the little cloth holder thing it is stored in.  The bottom line on this umbrellas it: totally awesome is all I can say.  I expect this product to last for years of regular rainy season use.  I did receive this product at a discounted price in exchange for an honest review because I have review allot of products on Amazon and lots of people have found my review to be helpful so I continue to review products that would otherwise not get many under this arrangement or that I am interested in.

I ordered the black version of the Sevitti umbrella. Upon opening, I found the umbrella came with double layered bag the same color as the umbrella (black). The bag appears to be made of the same water-proof material as the umbrella; I preformed a simple water droplet test on both a small section of both the interior and exterior of the bag and found it beaded up rather than soaking in, making this bag a nice bonus for keeping an already used/damp umbrella in your purse or brief case without the risk of getting the contents of your bag damp. The bag is small enough to roll up and stick into you pocket, it does however lacks any sort of hook to help aid in preventing the bag from being misplaced within the bag or while in transit and using the umbrella; but does fit snug enough (two hands required to slide it back into the bag) that is neither difficult to reinsert the umbrella, nor have the bag slide off and expose your bag interior to water.

The umbrella itself comes with a braided cord handle bolted into the base of the ergonomically shaped and lightly textured grip (sturdy plastic with a matte black finish) - I have rather small hands and experienced no issues with being able to grip the umbrella and have my wrist fitted completely through the loop, however my male roommate while able to slide his hand into the loop did experience some difficulty with removing it, so there is likely to be a slight issue with this part of the product if you have larger sized hands. The fabric of the umbrella is held secure when not in use with a single 3/4-inch/2 cm wide strip with Velcro on the end. The umbrella is operated via a push button in the base for both opening and closing the canopy; the umbrella must be manually pushed back into primed position after closure. The center rod of the umbrella is metal in construction, with a combination of both metal and plastic for the arms of the canopy. The canopy measures at approximately 46 inches/116.8 cm in diameter. The strength of the tension in the support rod requires two hands or a secondary surface to press the umbrella into to collapse it completely (a bonus in Texas' windy weather and often "sideways" falling rain). Collapsed, the umbrella is approximately 13 inches/33 cm long with a diameter of 7.5 inches/19cm when placed inside of its carrying bag.

Overall, umbrella has sturdy construction with a very powerful release. It's compact frame makes it easy to squeeze into a backpack or larger sized purse. The wrist strap is a bit on the small size, but doesn't inhibit the use of the umbrella. The carrying bag is a bit of a concern on keeping track of with it lacking any way to keep it paired with the umbrella. While I haven't had a chance to test its mettle out in the infrequent rains, I am looking forward to keeping this in my purse for such an occasion.

**I received this product at a discount in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.**
summary: making this bag a nice bonus for keeping an already used/damp umbrella in your ...

reviewText: Sevitti Travel Automatic Umbrella - Premium Quality Instantly Dry, 10-Rib, 42" Wide Durable and Windproof First let me state I received this Sevitti Travel Automatic Umbrella at a very discounted price in order to provide my unbiased opinion on the product. At first glance this umbrella reminds me of the real expensive umbrellas you would buy in the airport. Its black sleek look keeps the sophisticated look of any on the go business man while packing a large punch. I was fortunate to use this umbrella to shelter myself and my newborn baby from the rain and wind today. I loved how small and compact the umbrella was to fit into my purse ( approximately 13 inches) but then has the automatic release button to spring open the umbrella as well as retract the umbrella. The 42 inch wide circumference was perfect size. It was small enough to be compact but large enough to cover both my son and I while it was raining. I loved the durable feel of the material and the springs the umbrella had to pop open and close the umbrella quickly and efficiently. This umbrella is small in size but packs a punch in quality and efficiency! Great product and would recommend for any other mom's out there who are looking for a great product that protects against the elements, covers both you and your baby, and is easily transported/used.
summary: Small Compact but packed with a PUNCH

reviewText: I never really thought about one umbrella being superior to another umbrella. This umbrella is actually the best I have ever had. That's a true statement. It opens with such ease. All that is needed is the quick push of a button & voila...opens right up! It is so much sturdier than any other umbrella I ever held. It seems to handle extremely well in the wind as well. It has ten ribs. Ribs are the metal interior of the umbrella. These help to keep it solid & open in the elements. To close, all it takes is that same simple push of the button that it took to open it. With normal rainfall this  umbrella definitely dries off faster than others, but with downpours it may need some shaking off of the water. I noticed it did dry quicker after I shook it off. The handle is a bit narrow & it has a bit of a bend at the end, but it does fit my dainty hands well. It comes with its own little travel bag for storage when in the go. It comes in black & red, I have black because it is a neutral color. I recommend to anyone wanting to keep dry. I received this @ no cost for providing my honest opinion.

My new car came with a storage space next to the seat perfect for a compact umbrella. I wanted one that was small - 13 inches long is perfect - but big enough to offer good coverage. I wanted one that would hold up well against the wind and that had a button that could be used to open and close the umbrella automatically. This travel umbrella from Sevitti fulfills all those needs. It has 41 in wide coverage - it says 42 in the product description, but mine came out to 41 in. You can see in the video how easily it opens and closes and that it comes with 10 ribs to give it extra stability in the weather. The handle is slightly curved and feels very comfortable in your hand. There is also a small strap that can be used to hang it up - too small for a hand though. It dried very quickly in my water test from the garden hose. I am very pleased! Disclaimer: Product sample provided for free or discounted for an honest unbiased review with no means of payment or incentives offered in exchange.
summary: Great umbrella with one push to open & close!!

reviewText: If you're looking for a substantially made, easy to carry, and well priced umbrella look no further. This little guy is strong and durable and fits in my briefcase with ease. Upon opening up for the first time I could tell this thing runs laps around my old (and now broken due to gusty winds) umbrella. I am very happy with my purchase. Highly recommended.

I received a free sample travel umbrella for my objective review and evaluation and can highly recommend this premium product by Sevitti. The size is perfect for tucking into a bag or backpack and it has a nice cover made of material as well as a wristlet on the tip of the base. The umbrella opens with a single push on the button after you undo the velcro wraparound. The inside pieces with the springs are stitched in securely and the folding mechanism works well. When you push the button again, it snaps back together so you can then close it. I am unable to push it all back down to the handle without using two hands, but it folds back in securely and is easy to secure and re-cover to put away. The handle is really nice with a grip and curve to hold easily.

The size of the open umbrella is large enough to shelter two people if necessary. I love the red color that I chose. I travel a lot so the important thing to me was size, and this one is nice and compact so it will be easy to take along. It seems quite well made and I hope it lasts a long time.

I have this in red.

I like to carry an umbrella in my purse at all times, just in case, and I am constantly losing and breaking travel umbrellas.  So I have experience with a lot of different ones (usually Totes brand since those are readily available), as I buy replacements a couple of times a year.

I find this to be one of the better small umbrellas I've tried, actually.  When open, it's not as large as a full-sized umbrella, but it is larger than the compact Totes umbrella I had in my purse at the time.  It's actually quite a good size for something that folds up compactly, and adequate for protecting at least one person from the rain.  (You *could* squeeze two people under it but your backs might get a bit wet.)  The fabric part was in good shape with no holes or tears and it was securely connected to the spokes.

One of the ways I typically find that umbrellas break is when the ribs or shaft bend in the wind.  Although there has been very little wind here lately, so I couldn't test that aspect directly, I do think the solid parts of the construction of this umbrella are sturdier than the typical umbrella you would buy near the entrance of a store on a rainy day (you know those racks they put out).

Opening and closing are also easy -- push a button to open it and push the same button to retract the ribs (you will have to push down to collapse the shaft, yourself).

In the end, these cost a little more than the travel umbrellas I have used in the past, but they are also sturdier and have more coverage when open, so the difference in quality makes the price worth it.

Product provided by the seller for evaluation purposes.

This is a very pretty umbrella, especially in red.  It has very nice lines and an elegant curvy profile.  But there is a LOT of wiggle in the handle and shaft.  The "play" allows the umbrella to twist a bit too much in the wind.

The handle is thick and short.  I know that this is a travel umbrella, but for my long fingers, the handle is just too short, and I cannot grip it firmly.  Together with the play in the shaft, the wind takes better control of this umbrella than I can ever manage.

With the help of a button, this umbrella is very easy to pop open and close--that's always a plus.  It is a very forceful opening "pop", so you definitely have to remember to point it away from any person or thing, otherwise damage will definitely result.

Plus, on the umbrella that I received, there is glue or paint splotted in two places, and I cannot remove it.

*I received a sample product from Sevitti.
summary: Very pretty umbrella has some play in the shaft and handle

I was apprehensive about buying all four instead of testing one out first, but I'm glad I saw a better deal in spending $15 for all 4 instead of $9-10 for just 1. You realize how convenient it is to have all these different colors at your disposal. At first I was leaning toward the gold, but honestly I use the rose gold 50% more than I use any of the others.

*******what you should know!**************
1. The have a bit of weight to them, which isn't bad, you're just aware that there is a door knocker having from your nose (I love it).
2. My suggestion is to coat these babies in a layer of clear nail polish before use to help prevent tarnishing and allergic reactions.

I have sensitive skin when it comes to jewelry made out of cheaper metals, and based on some other reviews, I didn't want to risk tarnishing these pieces and having an itchy nose, so I knew I'd want to polish them asap. Dries really quickly and there's no lingering odor I popped one in 2 minutes later. Do yourself a favor and protect your new order.

Other than loose clasps, I'd say this was a wonderful buy. (fix the loose clasp by coating the insert (not the actual clasp) with nail polish)

Also, a lot of humans I meet really like them/ ask me where I get them. They're always thrown off when I say "Amazon" though haha.
summary: If you're wondering if it's worth it and you should get one to test it out first? Just get 'em all dude.

I bought this to complete a "period" costume for a local Dickens-themed event.  I happened across this scarf while searching here on Amazon's web site, and the reviews, while somewhat few in number, were solidly 5 star. So, I chose this item in the "Black/Gray Marble" design, and after wearing it, I absolutely concur with the other reviewers. I didn't want something itchy and this scarf is absolutely fantastic.  The material is cotton, which I favor, and is not at all itchy, heavy or "poofy",,, which I didn't want a pillow wrapped around my neck, so this fit the bill perfectly.  I can definitely see that I will wear this at other times than just the event for which I originally purchased it.  Sellers communication was excellent.  Overall an outstanding product from an excellent seller.  If you're wanting a scarf, I would highly recommend this product and this seller.

Great scarf by Marino!  Very soft!  I've been rubbing it against my face, so comfortable...  I wish I have one.  When I saw "Cashmere Feel" on the listing title, I wasn't sure what to expect but this scarf is really soft in person, I wish you can feel it.  Not made with cashmere of course, but it is very comfortable to wear and it is very warm.  I'm wearing, I mean testing it as I write up this review.  Wrapping comfortably around my neck, no itchy feeling at all.

It measures about 12 inches wide and about 70 inches long.  Long enough to wear differently, can simple wear it over your neck, or do a knot, or loop around, etc.  This will be another of my hubby's gift but I'm sure I'll be stealing it from time to time 'cause it is so comfortable and warm.  :)  It will made a great gift!  Would recommend.

reviewText: I just got this yesterday and I LOVE it! It is absolutely precious! I bought this for our little 1 year old daughter. She will be the flower girl in my brother's wedding in Mexico in May. We wanted to find a veil for her but everything was so huge! This is perfect for a toddler or little girl! Upon opening the packaging it was fairly wrinkled. However this can easily be fixed by hanging it up in the bathroom while you take a hot shower or if that doesn't work try adding a fabric steamer or iron from a distance. I wouldn't place it directly onto this material. I'm even thinking of adding a few more rhinestones to it! I will update my review with a photo after the wedding.

So I have to say I bought this veil for no other reason than the fact that my daughter saw it and LOVES dress up!  I decided to give it a try and see what the quality was like, Especially since I'm going to let my child play with it I didn't think it would last very long.  Much to my surprise, the veil came in a super cute bag, nicely wrapped!  The ends are well made, finished so they curl and flow beautifully.  The hair bow is smooth plastic with no rough spots to snag the hair.  The bow is nice fabric with cute flowers on both sides of the bow.  The entire veil fit perfectly, laid nicely and is overall a really nice item for any wedding, photoshop or little girls dress up wardrobe!!  I received this product at a discounted price in exchange for an unbiased and honset review. The views and opinions are completely my own based on my experience with the product and in no way are influenced by the discount.
summary: Absolutely beautifully made, perfect wedding veil for little girls!!

There's a center rhinestone ribbon holding the bow together and the flowers, three on one side three on the other. The bow and the veil are connected with a plastic hair comb. The veil is fairly long and the way it ruffles is so adorable. It's a very true white. I received this product at a discounted rate for an honest review and I'm using it for my flower girl in my wedding!!!

I purchased & received this shirt in a timely manner. The material of the shirt does not feel or look cheaply made. & there was no odd odor. Packaging was in tact & in great condition. I ordered a size xtra large( not knowing exactly how it would fit) but the shirt fits me & looks great. I'm a girl who has some curves & this shirt defintley shows my curves (in a good way) the lettering on the shirt itself was not faded. The shirt is long enough for me to cover my tummy. & looks great with shorts in the summer or skinny jeans in the spring. Its gives any look a little edge & completes any outfit. reviewText: great color...love it

This newsboy cap is a great color, fit, and perfect compliment to my style.  It is sturdy and a true to size in its fit.  I have quite a bit of curly hair, and the hat has a snap in the back to accommodate my hair, but further close to tighten up on my head after putting on the cap.  It has a strong brim on the front to hold shape.  I also love this denim material that I can throw on with jeans or any shirt with blazer, which is truly well styled for versatility.  This hat maker is hands down my favorite hat maker in my collection!

Please note that I received this product at a discount in return for an unbiased review. This unbiased review is my own honest opinion after trying this product.

It is indeed a better look than the usual ball cap. He switched his preferred style after visiting the British Isles.

To make the story short: I am VERY happy with my new skirt. I received many compliments about it! It's warm and beautiful! (theblength is 33 inches btw). I was very worried about the fabric when I ordered it at first because I was not sure about the quality. Specially since there are plenty skirts on AMAZON look exactly like this one. I was so lucky to choose this one and it arrived right on time (4 days after I put my order) from China! The material and the design is awesome!  The only thing you should consider while ordering it is the size. I ordered Small. What I received was X-Small which fitted me. If you are using U.S. size chart same as me be aware of this fact that you need to order one or two size larger than what you exactly need.

I was sent a coupon from the seller to purchase this- and so I got it at discounted price so I could review it.  We went to India in December, and we took this with us.  With airline regulations regarding luggage, it is not practical to have 2 bags if you can possibly STUFF everything in one- and keep it under 50 lbs.  In our case, we had a bag with clothing, and it was very full= and weight just under 50lbs.  However I was concerned about the zippers on the suitcase since they were stretched to the point that they were painful to look at.  Enter the BlueCostco Heavy Duty Long Cross luggage strap.

This thing IS heavy duty.  Its made out of very heavy nylon- and is sewed very securely anywhere necessary.  The sections slide via a loop on one side, and are adjustable with a buckle on the other- so you can make sure its very tight.  Once its adjusted properly, you can "sit" on the suitcase, and buckle this- and it takes all of the stress off the zippers, and transfers it to this.  It also makes it more visible when coming thru baggage claim- since most bags are very similar.

ADVANTAGES:

1- Removes Stress from suitcase Zippers.
2- Peace of mind knowing your suitcase won't accidentally get unlatched or pop open.
3- Makes your bag easily identifiable and visible when coming down baggage claim chute.
4- Extra places to grab the bag on baggage claim or out of taxi, car rental van, etc.
5- Extremely well made
6- Value priced.

DISADVANTAGES:

1- If you have your bag TIGHTLY packed and have to open it at airport- its hard to get it closed again!

You can see that the advantages clearly outweigh the disadvantages.  I am glad to own this, and I was very happy to have it on our long trip to India.  I highly recommend it for anyone who travels, or is going to travel as bags are very similar, and not always made as well as necessary.  This will help overcome those problems.  Thanks for reading.
summary: Strong, makes bag more visible- secure.

Obviously not a true theft deterrent, but would slow down someone getting into your bag without violating TSA regs.  Makes your suitcase easier to identify as well as it comes off the conveyor belt.

I purchased this strap to use on an ice chest that we will be using to bring meat back on an airplane. They are much sturdier than I was expecting and should hold up very well to the abuse luggage normally sees in baggage handling.  They have a lot of adjustment and are very easy to use.  I had some uncertainty on the dimensions of each strap, but after receiving the straps and measuring them, one strap is adjustable from 120cm-200cm and the other is adjustable from 100cm-180cm. The slide buckle that connects the two straps makes it so neither strap slides off the icechest.  The other advantage for air travel is that, due to the sliding buckle, there is no loose end hanging off, even when it is adjusted to the smallest dimension.
summary: Very sturdy, easy to install...even on an icechest!

reviewText: Good products
it is very strong heavy duty, just what I need for my trips

My carry-on suitcase is fairly poofy on its own, which can make things difficult if I only have a weekend's worth of clothing in it rattling around. I keep this strap on my carry-on at all times, it just makes it easier to manage (and easier to stuff in the overhead compartments for sure). It has also proven sturdy even when I've super-stuffed my suitcase.

So far I've only checked it once, and (despite a scuff on the plastic buckle) it held up really well. Will update if it gets damaged as checked luggage.

This was a second purchase for me. The straps work great at holding a weak suitcase together, make it harder for someone to access the inside of your suitcase, and they make it easy to identify your luggage at the airport.

I ordered this specifically for a trip I recently went on with 3 connection flights. I am always worried about my luggage when I have so many flights to catch. I gave this 4 stars only because I am not sure how much security it really provides. For my purposes, I wanted something that would make my bag visible and provide an extra deterent. I think it did both... however, I feel that it would be fairly easy for someone to cut thru the straps or loosen the tension. This strap took a good beating during my trip and held up wonderfully. I purchased another set for my family.
summary: Great way to ID your suitcase

reviewText: Nice product, and great purchasing experience.
Excellent quality

I was a little skeptical about flying with an action packer again, as a regualar tsa lock slides through the lock hole on the handles and my lid popped off. But this is a good alternative. It fits around the 24 gallon action packer by rubbermaid, which is the exact diminsions of largest luggage hard case. I can take chritmas presents without the worry they will get damage in transport. I will update my star rating after my trip, as the buckles are made of plastic and im not sure how they will hold up on a long flight. But the bottom line is the luggage stap is fully adjustable! The directions are literally about as good as ikea instructions but i figured it out just by looking at the images. The straps themselves appear durable and they do not slide around on the plastic. Which will definetely keep the lid and contents secure. The straps CAN be adjusted while on the case. It is more as a deterence towards theft, not a complete halt to it. The tsa lock is very comvient and makes going through pre check alot easier.
Way too complicated to be traveling on the go....very time consuming affair to get these on...
summary: Not so good for on the go travelers !!!!

reviewText: The strap arrangement did not work out well on my type of suitcase because I needed to place it over where the handle pulled up to use the wheels. Therefore, I could not pull up the handle to use with the strap in position.  The straps and locking mechanism seem sturdy and it would probably work fine on a suitcase without a pull up handle. I should have thought about the configuration of my suitcase before ordering.

reviewText: This is a huge pain in the neck to set up the first time, but works well. You won't to switch it between your various suit cases. Instead, just keep it on one and it will be fine.
summary: just keep it on one and it will be fine.

reviewText: I returned it.  I put the strap through both the top and side handles of my large suitcase, tightened snuggly, and in under two minutes I was able to l was able to loosen the straps enough to unzip the suitcase and access the entire contents.

I bought this product because my brand new suitcase popped open the last time I traveled (I'm pretty sure TSA didn't secure the bag after an inspection).  I don't care so much about keeping people out as just ensuring my stuff stays inside.  Plus, it's an easy way to distinguish a pretty generic bag.  I just placed the strap on my suitcase and it looks like it will work.  The initial placement was a bit of a struggle but it wasn't too difficult.  The product doesn't come with any directions.  I did have to come back to the product page a few times to help me figure out how it works.  I also want to note that my adjuster faces outward, unlike several other reviewers.  I think this is because I have a larger suitcase and the adjuster faces different directions based on whether the strap is expanded or not.  Once the adjuster is expanded to go through the triangle it faces a different direction.  Overall, I like it.  However, the real challenge will be the long day of travel I have ahead of me tomorrow.

I read reviews saying the luggage could be slipped out of the straps.  If you have a suitcase with a side handle and a top handle, you must run the strap underneath both handles. It CANNOT be easily slipped out.  We also tested the strap by trying to move the slide to adjust the length while it was buckled.  We could not adjust it to try to loosen the luggage out of the strap.  I also tested this travel strap on a two week trip through Europe. I was having zipper issues on my larger luggage and decided to give this a try.  Wow it worked great!  It held my luggage securely together and made my suitcase easy to find. The combination was easy to set.
LOVE IT!

This watch has no water resistance. I bought a wooden Topwell with a round case and it holds up to moisture much better.
Also does not look as good as the round in person.

This was an anniversary gift for my husband.  He absolutely loves this watch!  He says the same thing all the other reviewers say - it's super comfortable and light weight, easy to wear.  He was very happy that it fit perfectly and he did not have to remove any links.  Truly a very beautiful watch, and the perfect gift!

This watch is very well crafted and it being made of  wood makes it unique and a wonderful statement piece for any man in your life. The wood is sandalwood and red wood and that means it will only get better in appearance as far as color goes and won't show as much wear and tear (in my humble opinion) with time rather than most watches that wear and scratch along the band and face because of everyday work a man does. This watch is also hypoallergenic which is nice, it does have some metal a small piece where it latches together in the back,  however all the rest where it contacts skin is all wood including behind the face of the watch. The watch comes very nicely packaged in a gift giving type box and is wrapped around a black pillow which is very classy. The dials on this watch are very elegant and make the watch look really much more expensive than it actually is so that is wonderful. The time was accurate but one of the small dials needed to be changed. It didn't come with directions but was easy enough to figure out. I am going to have to remove one link as it is a bit big for my fiancees wrist but it can easily be done and I would rather have to remove a link because its too large rather than them running small.  I am very pleased with the quality of this watch and would absolutely recommend this purchase.  I received this product at a discounted price from the seller in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

I purchased this watch with my son in mind as a birthday gift. It arrived in a nice box, was wrapped around a little black pleather pillow, and is absolutely beautiful! When I took it out to be sure all was in working order, my husband was all over it. He said he had been seeing these wooden watches on Pinterest (who knew?!?!) and had been interested in researching where to get one for himself. He really likes the easy to snap/unsnap metal clasp, and the rich looking wood is light and smooth against his skin. My husband's wrist measurement is 8 inches around, and although it's slightly snug, he says it's comfortable on the low end of his wrist near his hand (where he usually wears his watch anyway). The 3 smaller dials on the face of the watch show the date, day and 24 hour display. If I had to complain about anything, it would be that this watch did not come with any product information or instructions on how to set it. There is actually a picture of the instructions in the product listing, but if my husband doesn't take this watch for himself, and I were giving this to anyone other than my adult son, it could have been a problem. It would also be nice for the recipient to have information on the type of wood, care instructions, etc.
I have recieved this product at a reduced rate in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.
summary: Elegant and casual at the same time!

Topwell continues to impress me with their watches.  Each watch is beautiful and trendy, lightweight and really makes a great impression.  The two toned red and black sandalwood men's watch has beautiful rich colors that will only get more beautiful over time.  There are individual eyes for the day of the week, date and 24 hour display.  The links can be easily removed for a perfect fit.  The large square face is trendy and very manly.  Topwell wooden watches are great for anyone with sensitive skin as even the back of the face is made from sandalwood.  The only bit of metal that will touch your skin is the clasp and it is made from stainless steel, which is tolerable by most everyone.

This watch is great for gift giving, especially for that hard to shop for man in your life.  It will be an excellent anniversary gift.  You really have to see these to appreciate the beauty.

Nicely packaged (perfect for gift giving), extremely slim, and exactly what I was looking for.  I only carry 4 or 5 cards daily and this works perfectly!

I really like this wallet. It just feels like a quality product. The leather feels soft enough that it gives the impression of quality, yet it is stiff enough to hold its shape and sit in a breast pocket comfortably. It also has many pockets, more than I need at least. Credit cards and other card slide in well and are in there snug enough to not slide out. But they also easily come out when needed.

Regarding the size, the slimness is good, but I do find the overall dimensions to be just a little too big. I think the length could have been a little big shorter, say 1/4" (currently 4-1/8") and also the height (currently 3-1/8") about 1/4" smaller too. That would mean spacing the pockets a little closer together, but that would be okay. It would just make the overall footprint smaller and more compact. But that's just my personal preference. I've included a picture of the wallet next to the Crabby wallet, which is about as small as you can get (no RFID blocking though).

Overall, a great wallet and one I will continue to use.

I normally have a nice (though bulky) leather wallet. I don't generally keep a ton of cash in it (in fact I mostly use cards) so it always seemed like it was thicker than it should have been. I decided to try this RFID wallet, both because I was interested in slimming down the size of my wallet and also because now with the ubiquitous nature of identify theft, protecting my cards with the RFID feature seemed like a good way to prevent myself from having to deal with the headache of canceling cards and disputing claims (which Ive done 3 times this year after my iPad was breached).

So far, I am really happy with this wallet. It is very thin - it takes up a small fraction of the space my previous wallet did. True, there isn't a ton of room for lots of cards, but Im able to comfortably keep 10 cards in it with some cash in the middle. Having less space for an excessive amount of cards forced me to re-evaluate their necessity and I realized that quite a few cards Id been carrying around really didn't need to be in there. Honestly, does a person really need more than 10 cards in their wallet?

This wallet is made of leather and so far seems to be made well; the stitching feels solid and even though Ive only had it a few days, I feel confident that it will last a good while. If not, I will update this review to reflect that.

This wallet is really great for someone who:
-Is worried about identity/credit card theft
-wants a really slim wallet
-is looking to cut down on the amount of unnecessary junk in their wallet and needs a little motivation
-doesnt go around with a lot of cash
-isnt looking to keep change or a condom (or anything else like that) inside the wallet.

UPDATE 9/29/16: I've been using this wallet for close to a year now, and am still just as happy with it. It is showing no signs of wear, the stitching is still in excellent condition, and the compact size prevents me from accumulating the typical 'junk' I used to to stash in previous wallets. I'm very happy that I upgraded from my previous wallet and still highly recommend it. If you found this review helpful, please let me know!
summary: Still loving this wallet after using it more than a year!

reviewText: I am very pleased. reviewText:
What a great slim wallet. Over the past few months i've been scaling down my amount of cards that I have in my wallet with all those new phone apps out there. I no longer need to carry all those store loyalty cards and many of my credit cards. For the ones that I do need to carry including my drivers license and registration, this wallet makes carrying them easy and compact.

There are 6 sections to stash your cards and cash. I do not use it to hold money though,  just my essential cards, driver license, registration and a few other essentials. I just got my new credit cards that have the new chip and I can feel safe that they will be protected with the RFID blocking material inside the wallet.

One of the two narrow slots on the back has an issue that when you pull out the card it also pulls the fabric out with it and needs to be stuffed back every time.

On the larger slots on the front you can fit multiple cards in each and it still doesn't add much bulk to the wallet. But if you add cash to the middle largest compartment, then the wallet does get a bit bulky.

Its a great leather slim wallet that seems well made and is nice looking for anyone not just men.
summary: Well made slim style wallet with plenty of compartments

This wallet is very slender -- just big enough to hold an ID with a few credit cards or business cards.  It's perfect to slip inside an evening bag or small clutch.  A man could use it if he wanted a slim wallet to slip inside his jacket pocket.  It's barely bigger than my cell phone case.

It comes in a very nice box  for gift giving.  Would make an excellent Christmas or birthday gift!

reviewText:
Christmas is coming around the corner and this slim wallet is a good value. The leather is soft, and it has a small profile. it can easily fit several credit cards and some cash. perfect for those who want to maintain a small wallet, not the George Costanza Wallet. It looks like a strong build and I can easily put a few cards in here. I don't think it has a large enough fingerprint for pick pockets to even notice this in my wallet.

One thing I will note is the packaging. It's nice packaging, making it good for a christmas gift. i'm not sure how this is made, but it's got a sturdy feel to it. I don't feel like I could rip it apart like other wallets.

This wallet is designed to protect RFID skimmers, or cards that you can "tap." So keep that in mind when you put cards into this wallet.

Overall, I'm happy that I now have a small profile slim wallet. I'd recommend this to anyone.

I received this from my daughter for Mother's Day.  I just love it!!  The ladies that I volunteer with at the hospital are all jealous and want one too.  I am taking a trip this summer and am so relieved that my cards will be secure.

OK, I was prepared to not like this wallet, but now that I've tested it out, I REALLY like it. I have carried a traditional back-pocket wallet all my life, but lately I have taken to removing it from my pocket when I'm driving, because it's just too thick and uncomfortable, especially for longer distances.

But this slim front-pocket wallet is just what the doctor ordered for everyday carry and travel, too. When I made the transition, I took some time to sort through my cards and other wallet paraphernalia, and I picked out the few items I decided I actually use. It wound up being less than I imagined, so I put those items (2 credit cards, my driver's license and one other identifying document, a little cash, and some toothpicks -don't ask). With those items inside, this wallet is still super comfortable in either my front- or my back-pocket, even when I'm driving.

There are a few items, like my library card and AAA card, that I don't use very often but I like to have with me, just in case. those items I have taken to just keeping in the console of my car, so they're available when I need them, which isn't often.

So, I give the wallet five-stars. I really like it, it's extremely well constructed of real leather, very good-looking, and the RFID protection is a bonus. Honestly, for just about any guy, I don't think you can go wrong. I would really like receiving this wallet as a gift, and I think most guys I know would, too. In fact, I've shown it to a few friends, and they all love the concept and would welcome a chance to try one out.

I love that it has RFID to prevent hackers/thieves from stealing the numbers from your cards & the security codes. You can never be too careful these days. Makes a great gift for the man in your life!

reviewText: lovely wallet - super slim - just as advertised

This is the perfect solution for carrying minimal cards with you - driver's license, and a couple of credit cards, just the essentials.  You will carry these with ease and extreme comfort and beauty, in a product that is extremely well crafted and stylish.  I am a mature woman and do not hesitate to have this with me at all times, while taking a walk with the dogs, or just shopping when I want both hands free to maneuver around.  Light, compact, and beautiful, and extraordinarily well made.  You will not regret your decision.  I use this compact model in conjunction with a stainless steel case that carries all my other cards that I do  not need regularly and that fit comfortably in my larger purse.  But when you want to go light and easy, or just keep this very accessible in your purse, and I like small purses, this is definitely your answer.  It may not have that feminine charm you are used to, but you will have the RFID security we all need in today's world of scammers, and the utility you rely on.  Think about what is most important and you will make this your obvious choice.

This is a faux alligator skin party clutch bag that you can take for a night out (think semi-casual cocktail party or prom night) or give as a gift.  Although the material feels well-made and sturdy, it is truly meant for that night out and is not practical enough to use every day.  Having said that, this is a nice accessory.  It has four compartments. My LG G3, fits easily in the compartment at the back, the second largest compartment is a good place to put your money, the middle, zip-up compartment would be a good for cosmetics so you can freshen up, and the smallest compartment in the front is where you would put your credit cards and drivers license.

The clutch bag has a detachable wrist strap which makes it a bit more convenient in a party setting as you can put this over your wrist and have a hand free but while you are holding the clutch bag this way, you are making it easier to steal.  So I would be careful with that.

Another plus is that the purple color of the clutch bag goes with most things and is not too flashy.

I expect I will be making use of it when my husband and I go to a Thanksgiving or Christmas party.  It is that time of year.  But after that, it will probably go into my closet to wait till its this time of year again.

I expect this is true for many peoplewhich is why the price ($11.99) is a reasonable one.  All in all, for the price this is an elegant and affordable clutch bag.

Disclaimer: This clutch bag was provided in exchange for a fair and honest review.  The opinions expressed are my own.

reviewText: A nice rosary. I prefer wooden beads to plastic or metal, so this is perfect. The crucifix and St. Benedict Medals are also nice. The beads are small and the chain doesn't get caught on itself like some do, so this has been a good rosary to carry in a pocket.
Beautiful rosary, and it arrived a day early. I have many rosaries, but I ordered this particular one to celebrate a special occasion in my life. It's perfect.

This is a really beautiful rosary, especially for the price. The beads are made of walnut wood, the chain is stainless steel, the finely detailed medals are pewter, and the gorgeous, intricate crucifix is pewter and enamel. It feels delicate, but it is actually quite durable, although I wouldn't yank on it TOO much, just to be safe. All in all, a great purchase I couldn't recommend enough! It also comes in a handy plastic box with a lovely portrait of St. Benedict on it, and the beads smell like inscense. Love this
This rosary is absolutely beautiful.  It is much, much nicer than it appears in the photo.

This came in an over-sized bubble envelope with no other wrapping. It was inside a standard plastic rosary case with a sticker on the top of St. Benedict. The way it was shipped caused the case to crack and it's unusable but the rosary was not damaged and I wanted to wear and display mine so it doesn't bother me. In the scheme of things, this was a small error.

I searched high and low not only for a rosary that was aesthetically pleasing but also for one that met a certain price point and that didn't appear to be cheaply made. No matter who makes a rosary, the parts are universal and therefore common. I also wanted one that is wood and steel and therefore not flashy. I've been gifted a few rosaries before and it's such a personal matter that I prefer to choose or make my own.

PATRON SAINT: St. Benedict is the patron saint of everything from monastic life and religious orders to Europe and poison.

QUALITY: The parts used to make the rosary are fair. Overall this is good quality. There were no abnormalities, broken parts, and Jesus didn't fall off the crucifix (something that happened to another reviewer with a different rosary)! The pieces are all double-sided and with decent detailing which are key features especially if you choose to wear it. The length is average and good for that.

It still feels very lightweight in the hand and the dainty steel chain is something I'll probably replace. This can be done at any local bead store. They sell chain and other fittings for cheap and with a pair of hobby pliers rosaries are inexpensive and easy to make. I just don't have time. Parts used to be made of pewter giving them some weight and durability. Not sure what these are made of. The beads are a nice size. I love the variegated colors of the beads. Nothing has rubbed off on my hands or tarnished.

SUMMARY: So while the container arrived broken, the rosary was fine. It's good quality and at a reasonable price point. I'll purchase from this seller again and recommend this product for prayer, display, and wearing. As for durability, it may not hold up long term being carried around in a pant or coat pocket with other items. "S" hooks are used to make rosaries and are notorious for coming apart easily. It's not a sign of poor craftmanship.

I bought this bamboo leg, black frame, orange lens glasses because I wanted better viewing for driving and biking .

The glasses came in a box, in a bag, wrapped in a felt material to protect the glasses. They were in perfect shape. The glasses did come in slightly bigger than expected, however, it fit perfectly on my oversized head and the lens provide a much wider viewing area. Very comfortable.

When making this review the price of the item was 11.99.

I am not an Amazon company affiliate. I am an Amazon Prime customer that enjoys writing reviews as a hobby. I received this product at a promotional price or free. I rely on reviews before making purchases online, and hope that my review was able to help you in making your own decisions. If my review has helped you, please thumbs up so I can continue to provide helpful information for your purchasing. If you have any questions or comments, please comment or message and I will be glad to help!

I wear these every day.  They are my go to shades.  I wanted to really wear them and put them thru the summer paces before I made my review.  I got them a few days before I went to a waterpark so I decided that would be a good test of them.  I wore them all day, without problems.  They fit very well, the wood arms are very sturdy.  The lenses are nice and clear, and really do a good job of keeping the bright sun out of your eyes.  handmade, is etched into the end of one arm, along with a model number.  I would not have a problem buying these again, because I really like how they fit and the look.  Im a surfer, summer loving girl, and these fit into my style great.  They also provide a nice cleaning cloth, along with a carrying bag to keep them from getting scratched.  It was 100 degrees the day I went to a waterpark, and not a cloud in the sky.  I could go thru my day and enjoy myself without the sun being in my eyes.  I really like that these are dark enough, that they keep the brightness out of your eyes.  I great product, and I like the handmade touch very much.

These guys look great. I was looking for a cheaper alternative to some of the name brands of sunglasses and these baby's did not disappoint.

I also own a pair of Oakley Sunglasses, with a similar style and I would say that the Suasi glasses compare to the fit and quality of my other glasses. The shades provide a good transition without being too dark like other sunglasses. The sides of the lens come in a light shade of handmade wood and look great. It also comes with a carrying pouch as well, which I really appreciate. The frame of the glasses fit snuggly on my head without pinching too much, and I would say that I have an average sized head (I'm 6ft 150 lbs). The frame was a little large for my head, but I like the larger fit - it may not be for everyone though.

I received this product at a discount in return for an unbiased and honest review. If the product would have sucked, I would have told you.

The Suasi eyeglasses are great. I love the bamboo legs/temples. They really make the sunglasses stand out from your regular metal/plastic materials. I purchased the red lenses as well as the black.

My one con would be the fitting. For whatever reason the red setup fits a little tighter than the black. I was thinking about taking a hair dryer and heat gun and very carefully bend the plastic frame to flex it out more.

Overall, I like the Suasi sunglasses. Maybe as a suggestion to the maker/seller I would want the option of having polarized glasses. I did received these at a discounted rate in exchange for my honest review. I'd recommend these to anyone but be sure to check the measurements and expect a slightly smaller fit.
summary: Fashionable sunglasses at an affordable price

summary: Fingerless gloves, but also great toddler leg warmers!

reviewText: I love my gloves! Can't wait to wear them!!!
I love love love my gloves. Took a little while to get here but they are soo cute :)

As kids become teenagers (and especially teenage girls) the less flexible they get about what they want to wear.  Living in Michigan, we have to deal with pretty rough winters and my job as a mother is to keep my kids as healthy and safe as possible.  I am always on the lookout for the next trend for my daughter as well as creative ideas and ways to keep her warm during the winter.

When I discovered the this fuzzy glove set, I thought it was adorable.  I got them in grey to match both of her coats.  I was happy that they weren't too expensive since I had the feeling she might be too into wearing them.  My only issue is that they vary in price per color which pushes you to buy the cheaper color instead of picking the one that fits your style best.  These were adorable once they arrived and super soft.  The grey was the perfect choice as my daughter has actually been wearing them since they arrived!

ELEGANT!  These fuzzy Palm Warmers are actually very USEFUL!  There are so many times I just want my fingers free, yet my hands are cold!  Like grocery shopping, how can you pick fruit and veggies for ripeness with gloves on?  I still buy produce in winter so these gloves are a real help!

These gloves are a knitted black material with a faux fur edge.  I really find them to be very SOFT and SUPER COMFORTABLE.  There are times when I am at home and my hands are freezing but I need my fingers free to do home work.  I don these palm warmers on and my hands and wrists are toasty warm and my fingers are free to type away.  I really love these gloves!  I was also surprised by the BONUS GIFT of a beaded bracelet!  Love that touch! Thank you!

I feel so ELEGANT wearing these palm warmers, They remind me of the old times, the 1920's or 1930's, when wealthy women wore finger-less gloves so they could show off their elaborate rings.  Poor women wore finger-less gloves so their fingers would remain free to sew or embroider.  Palm warmers are the modern day solution to carrying out simple tasks!

I wore these over the Thanksgiving weekend, with my rigs on and my bracelet (included) over the glove.  This made a real CLASSIC look!  I plan on getting a lot of use out of these palm warmers.

I recommend them to anyone who need their fingers free during tasks!

Disclaimer - I received this item for my honest and unbiased review.  All opinions are my own based on personal experience.
summary: Hands and Wrists are toasty warm, fingers are free!

reviewText: Cute and warm forearm gloves i'll definitely order a different colors of these
it is very warm to my hand. best and suit as what  I expected.

I will be wearing these gloves all winter long! I love them, they fit great and look gorgeous on! My normally don't wear gloves in the winter because I find them uncomfortable and they feel tight when I wear my wedding rings. I can't move my fingers well in traditional gloves and just find them more of a hindrance than I'm willing to deal with. These winter gloves from FuzzyGreen are the perfect solution to keeping my hands warm while having all the flexibility I want. We just had a good cold snap and I put them to the test! While my fingers weren't covered they stayed just as warm as they would have in normal gloves. They stayed in place, no slipping, bunching or movement what so ever. The faux fur is an added bonus in that it offer an extra layer of protection while adding style and beauty. They are cable knit that is soft and warm. They go up past my wrist, a huge plus to me, and continue up my arm to about half way between hand and elbow. The length is fantastic since I have long arms and my wrists never seem to be covered either by my coat or any gloves but these winter gloves solves all that! I am super happy to have these gloves and will be wearing them all winter long! One note: they do take a long time to get here, so if you are ordering for the holidays, I suggest you order now and cross your fingers. This wasn't an issue for me since I tend to order gifts that I know are going to take a while to get here, early. I was provided a sample of the product for my honest unbiased review. My opinions are my own and are not influenced in any way.
summary: These are the perfect solution if you hate cumbersome gloves yet want your hands to stay warm! I love them!

This tie bar is exactly what it says on the tin... and by tin I mean a really fancy looking box!

It shipped over here on time and in a very protective package. When I opened it up I noticed how stylish its presentation was! The little tie clip is placed into a velvety black box that can be shown off as if it was on a pedestal with ease.

Moving on to the actual little silver tie bar, it is exactly that! I usually use thinner ties so this was perfect for the job. However I tested it out with a new and thicker tie and it certainly could not pin it down for much time at all.

This is a small tie bar that serves its purpose well. It is unmarked and unblemished and accomplishes its task, but only for thin ties! As I had previously stated, this is perfect for me and thus I am very happy with this purchase. However do note that I got a reduced price on this silver tie bar as I had ordered it for evaluative purposes. Despite this fact I am giving my truthful evaluation that is completely grounded in my own personal beliefs and experiences.
summary: I usually use thinner ties so this was perfect for the job

reviewText:
This is an awesome little you're bar that's sized for the more modern tie widths. It's a very stylish brushed stainless steel, and the shape is both modern and classic.

I've paired it with some modern sized ties (3" vs the skinny tie width of 2.5"), and it's about as small as I'd like to go.

The packaging is very nice, and these would easily make good groomsmen gifts alongside fun skinny ties.

As far as features go, the tie bar does its job well: it is fairly easy to slide on, and once there it does not come off without some work.

If you're looking for a minimalist tie bar for skinnier ties, it's hard to beat this one.
summary: Great tie bar for medium to skinny ties

reviewText:
Mens Tie Clip Bar for Regular & Skinny Neckties, Matte Silver Gold GQ - MAD MEN - Donald Trump - Clips

It was a lot smaller than expected so it really does only work for Skinny ties. Regular sized ties might work, but it won't really secure it in place with this tie clip. If you wanted something for both skinny and fat neck ties, you might check out something else other than this.

The metal clip looks nice and has a nice finish to it, but it does feel a bit light and cheap. If you were to give this as a gift to wow your significant other, I'm not sure if it'll do that, but is functional and nice to look at. It's a great price compared to what else is out there and works when you're in a bind. I love the simplicity of the design. It can be business casual or formal to match any sort of event ensemble.

I love this tie bar in addition to the way that it was packaged up. It came in such a cute little box that presented it very nicely. The metal is such a beautiful sheen and the sizing is perfect. It looks very nice and the quality is really great. I highly recommend this for any guy looking to up the style factor of his wardrobe with a minimal investment in space and change.

The clip comes in a cool little box that I'm using to store the clip in so that I don't lose it. What else is there to say? It's a fricken cool tie clip that does its job perfectly!

Despite receiving the sellers discounted price for this item, I rate the product as if purchased for full retail and with the same degree of scrutiny. I personally rely heavily on other customers reviews when making a purchase on Amazon and I take writing my own reviews very seriously. Hence, I take the honest and unbiased aspect of all of my reviews very seriously. I don't hesitate to write a critical review or rate items low when warranted. All opinions and words are 100% my own. I was not required to write a positive review in exchange. If anything changes with my feelings or opinion on the product I will update my review with appropriate information.
summary: The metal clip looks nice and has a nice finish to it

reviewText: Excellent bracelet for the price. Bought as a Christmas present for my wife and she loved it.

Yes, I bought this as much less expensive alternative to pricey etsy shopped hair band holding bracelets. And, as another reviewer noted it totally works for that.
After I gently adjusted the opening of the bangle to my wrist size it's been a fun way to wear my hair accessories and stay stylish. No more cut off arm circulation or looking like I can't decide on a hair style! It does take a little practice to get the hair band on the bracelet, but not that much. And I do have to put the bracelet on my wrist and then the band on the bracelet because of the nature of the cuff styling. Not that big of a deal, but this does not slip over the hand, it has to be put on C style for it to fit correctly.
Comfortable, shiny, and holds hair bands, all at a price that is wallet friendly.

I took a chance on this, hoping it would work for holding a hair elastic. The groove is somewhat shallow, and it definitely took me about ten tries of focused practice before I got the hang of it. However, once you do, it's easy to slip a hair tie on, and it holds it securely! A much less expensive option than the bracelet sold expressly for this purpose.

I also found a DIY solution to make it easier to hold hair bands--you can super glue butterfly earring backs to the ends of the bangle (use needle-nose pliers to tighten the curves on them, if you like), and it creates a "notch" to rest the tie in as you slip it on. It sounds crazy, but they are small and unnoticeable on the bottom of the bracelet, and it does the trick! This only works for skinny hair ties.

We use cloth diapers, so there is plenty of room for her diaper covers in one zipper section, diaper inserts in the other zipper section, wipes and a folded changing mat in the middle open section, and a wet bag tucked into one of the small mesh pockets and emergency Hefty handy bags in another mesh pocket.  There is still plenty of small pockets for other thingy-majiggys that I may want to add in the future.  I also like that I can fold and snap it flat when I need it out of the way.  It is very well made for the price, the only downside is that it has to ship from China, so it takes a few weeks to arrive... but this was not a problem for me since I did not need it right away.

reviewText: This is a cute set that includes a striped fedora hat, a pair of sunglasses and a pair of suspenders, perfect for a mobster costume. It's been holding up well after being played with by two rough and tumble boys. I received my set at a discounted price in exchange for my honest review.

This trio is just the answer to a low key costume for just a few bucks. It comes with a black and white pinstripe fedora, shades, and suspenders. Throw on a basic button up shirt, some black pants, and dress shoes. You're set!

The fedora is a type of durable mesh. It can become misshapen if not handled properly so handle with care. Ours arrived a little bent, but we were able to shape it back again. It will fit an average sized person's head. There are no sharp or pointy edges so the hat is pretty comfortable. The glasses are smooth plastic with dark lenses and the suspenders are very versatile. They seem like they'd fit a wide range of people.

It's a great set and I'm glad to have it around for next Halloween. I have a flapper dress and my husband has this so that will make things simple! I highly recommend this. I received this at a discount in exchange for my honest opinion.

reviewText:
I cant say enough good things about this three pocket suit. It looks modern and stylish. The slim fit was a perfect fit for me (I am a 37 chest and bought the 38 Regular). It really is a slim fit  its snug against the shoulders, but still has room to move a bit, but is tight and close to your body just as slim fits are meant to be. Its comfortable to wear for hours and hours, so don't let the tight and close scare you away. Slim fit suits are whats in style right now!

The quality is fantastic and rivals the suits Ive worn to weddings, etc. from Mens Warehouse or Als Formal Wear. Its not too heavy, but doesnt feel cheap in the slightest. For this particular suit the stitching is visible (unlike some suits that have the fabric folded over and stitching hidden). I like the look of it, just pointing that out (you can see it better in the pictures).

I got the charcoal suit and wore it to a company holiday party and received so many compliments. My wife really loves it on me too. If you're looking to modernize your suit collection or just looking to add another professional piece to your closet, this suit is a great choice. I would absolutely recommend it. I plan on getting more colors in it because I like it so much.

One thing to note - you will likely want to get the pants tailored - they come long so that you are able to adjust for your height. I did not take them to a tailor for the pictures, but I will.

I was provided a sample of this product at a discounted price for review. Everything written is my honest opinion.
summary: A modern and stylish suit that turn heads

reviewText: Shipping was faster than anticipated. And the two-piece set arrived as expected: the slim fit of the jacket and pants is rather good (although the jacket was a bit wrinkled upon arrival--needs ironing--which is understandable). My initial impression of the sleeves was that it ran a bit shorter than I am used to but judging based on the appropriate sleeve length in relation to the sleeve of the dress shirt underneath it may not be a real issue. So I am at ease. Fabric is of premium quality and seems excellent to use for all the seasons. From the sample images, the vertical length of the jacket was a concern, but the jacket actually drapes well, appears finely tailored, and looks professional. The pants are a very comfortable fit for me and will, of course, need hemming. All in all, a solid buy. I purchased 36R and 30 waist (grey). I am 5'10 and 140 lbs.
summary: Happy with my first purchase from P&L

I'm very happy with this purchase.

What can I say about this suit that has not been said...not much..haha i'm kidding. Well, AFTER reading all the reviews regarding size I finally picked out the sizes for my fiancee's groomsmen. My fiancee gave me the task to get them with the requirement that it is a good price and it can be a suit they can wear outside the wedding. It Is PERFECT!!! Sizing is pretty spot on too. You just have to make sure you get know the measurements of the man's chest and waist before purchasing. One groomsman has measurements of 45" Chest and 39" waist and we got the 46L 40 Waist for him. It fit spot on and was comfortable for him. My fiancee tried on my brother's pants who has a 36" waist. My fiancee has a 38" waist though. The pants still fit him but it was not as comfortable as would someone who had a slightly smaller waist. So if your waist measurements are 36"-37.5" waist the 42S/L/R and 36" Waist size would fit you nicely. But a common tip I read was that if you don't have a standard ratio of chest to waist that is used to standardize these suit sizing then make sure you buy the largest of the two sizes. Worked out for me... Well, this is also true for those willing to tailor their suits later so having a slightly larger suit via jacket or pants would be easier to alter than having a smaller size. But for me, I really wanted to buy something I really did not want to do a lot of work on. I apparently will be altering some of the groomsmen suits too by myself so...yeh.... Lots of work for the bride...Anyways, these suits are an amazing choice for people who don't want to fork out hundreds for perfect tailored suits. Just need to hem the pants bottom and DONE! These suits aren't awkward sizing like some I've seen. All the good reviews and ratings for these suits are spot on if not deserving more. Really helped out this bride on a budget and mission to do it all.
summary: Perfect Suit sizing, just got to have actual Chest and Waist Measurements!

As a first suit or a quick emergency pickup, this suit is actually spectacular for the price. Most importantly the jacket and pant waist size will fit exactly as the size selected. The only drawback, i guess, is that the pant bottoms will arrive un-hemmed but most people should not mind as they might prefer to be able to alter the length to their exact specifications anyway. The material is quite nice, smooth, and very light. The label says "made in Cambodia" for what its worth, but the lining and stitching was surprisingly detailed. The outer pockets on the jackets are sown shut so you will have to cut them open or have your tailor do that. Inside of the jacket, there are three very well lined & stitched pockets on the left and one more to the right. As for whether it is sufficiently slim or not, i can tell you that the jacket definitely is slim & snug, however the pants are slightly wide and un-hemmed but again, its a quick fix with a visit to a tailor. For $80, you are definitely getting the most bang for your buck.
summary: The material is quite nice, smooth

reviewText:
I carry some cash and 4-5 cards at any given time.  The money clip holds firmly on everything and bounces back to its original "snap" every time I have to get a card.  It is extremely light weight but durable.  I am pleased with my purchase.
I also don't notice the "Serman Brands" branding unless I look closely for it, it's a non-issue.

SERMAN BRANDS-Carbon Fiber Money Clip Credit Card holder Slim Business Card Holder Clips for men Glossy - Matte

Very lightweight & comfortable in front pants pockets.  Holds several bills & plastic cards (CC, ID, etc).  Only time will tell as far as durability goes.

After receiving, I immediately looked for the logo I had read so much about (including Serman Brands seller urging to verify logo for genuine product).  I wasn't too concerned even if it did have a visible logo, as the money clip is in your pocket most of the time anyway.  How important is a slightly visible logo (on the back of clip) anyway?  I did not see a logo on mine so contacted the seller.  I received a prompt reply concerning the logo:

"We removed the S|B and left the SERMAN BRANDS. We changed the colors to a dark gray to make the logo a little less visible and blend in with the money clip. The logo is on the back on the clip on the very bottom, it is almost invisible.  A lot of our customers asked us to make the logo less visible."

I was still concerned about receiving a genuine product because I did not see a log on mine.  However, after several minutes of looking in a well lit area and holding at just the right angle, I was finally able to barely see/read the logo.  If you hold at a slightly different angle you can't see it.  I was amazed.  I was specifically looking for it and I still had a hard time seeing the logo.  Truth be told, it is basically invisible on mine (Matte).  You'll never know it's there.

I look forward to many years of use.

UPDATED REVIEW: I purchased this for my boyfriend as he had a money clip before, but the old one couldn't hold as much as he needed it to. This is an extremely low profile money clip, and he has gotten many compliments on it. WARNING!! If you purchase this and try and stuff it full (my boyfriend used 8 cards and a wad of cash), it will stretch out too far and not be able to hold one bill as tightly as it did before. After being disappointed and posting a negative review, the company reached out to me and sent me a new one for my boyfriend. I guess it does have an overload capacity, I have since then told my boyfriend to not put too much cash in it. 5 stars for a great product when you use it correctly and great customer service as well.
summary: Low profile, looks great, amazing gift!

reviewText:
Sept 2017 ** After 5 months, still great but it did stretch a little after a few days having A LOT of CCs and $bills in it. The front and back were not extended beyond parallel so I thought it would have retained full spring back. I originally rated 4-star and left it 4-star because 3 would have been too low, maybe 3.5 now. It still looks almost brand new with keys and coins in the same pocket.

April 2017 ** I just received it but I love it so far. I've been using money clips for maybe 30ish years and this seems like the best so far. The thin and light carbon fiber is the best, that's why I went to money clips so long ago was less weight and less bulk. The gold/black looks sharp but I'm afraid the gloss finish will get scratched up easily but the gold I think will look better than the matte  black.

My issue has always been, over time the constant open/close of inserting money and removing it wears on the curved part of the clip and breaks there eventually. Time will tell, I'm going for longevity, especially since it's exactly what I want.

Some others have mentioned and complained about the "S|B SERMAN BRANDS" logo but on my unit, it's barely noticeable unless in the exact right light SEE PHOTO.

The only reason for the 4-star rating, and not 5, is the unit was apparently manufactured in lengthy sheets and shaped and cut one by one leaving minor jagged edges, mostly on the inside surface around the unit but still where it will be touched when inserting money and cards back into it.
The money clip was everything I thought it would. I love it So far...

reviewText: The reason why this thing is great, compared to every metal money clip I've used is that apparently Carbon Fiber is just better at not stretching out.  Invariably with metal money clips, I'd end up putting too much into it, and then it would lose it's tightness, and then when I didn't have a lot of cash, everything would just fall out.  Then I'd end up stepping on the thing to try to bend it back to shape.  Eventually this just stops working.  With carbon fiber, it's simply much more resistant to stretching out.  One thing to note: if you put too much in this thing, and it takes a lot, it'll make a cracking sound, and you'll find that it's gotten stretched out a bit.  This is why I had to order a second one, but in an amount of time in which I would have gone through several metal money clips.
summary: Best money clip I've ever owned simply for its tightness

I've been testing out this carbon fiber money clip for the past couple weeks, and I have to say that at first I was a bit skeptical. I have always used a billfold, so this is a bit different. Nonetheless, this thing has grown on me. I really like it.

This doesn't hold as much as my old billfold did, but that's actually a good thing. I would always be carrying around too many cards that I didn't need. This money clip really helped me to simplify what's in my pocket.

Carbon fiber is very strong. It looks great, and everyone notices when you pull this out. It looks expensive. It is very rigid and holds its shape well -- you could have 15 cards in it for a month and then remove them all, and the money clip will go back to its original shape. This money clip will comfortably hold 2 debit cards, 2 ID cards, my insurance card, a couple gift cards, and about $300 cash (composed of various denominations of bills.)

I think that this is my new permanent replacement for my old leather billfold. This is just so much more comfortable in my back pocket -- I honestly don't even notice that it's there, making sitting down very comfortable.

I received my Balaclava Hooded Flece cap  and my son took it right away and put it on.  He said it is very soft keeps his ears and had really warm . He said the ties on the side  were great you could pull them tight to make the hood tighter or pull them loose to make the hood looser he said it was great that it was easy to move so that he could keep his nose out of it or cover it up if he was too cold.  He loves that it is a black color he said he feels like a ninja wearing it.. Lol.  This is definitely a good good to have for winter time if you are out working in that weather or for kids to have to play in the snow.  I received this fleece hood at a discounted price for my honest review .

This is a really great Balaclava Thermal Fleece Full Face Cover offered by Super Z Outlet.  It will definitely keep my husbands face a bit warmer in the winter months when shoveling and sledding with our toddler.  Would it keep his face warmer while skiing?  Yeah, of course, but it won't protect him 100% from the cold.  Fleece is breathable and so when skiing downhill at 40-50 mph, you will obviously feel the cold.  However, it will definitely take the bite out of the cold.

I love that this is adjustable and fits all sizes.  My husband's head is typically a 2xl while mine is a medium.  We are both able to wear and adjust this to our own specific sizing requirements by pulling on the 2 elastic cords on either side of the opening.  It does cover our noses which is great as well, although in the winter, this will still cause a little bit of sweating between the mouth and nose.

I also love that on me, the bottom of the cover goes down far enough to cover my full neck which can be tucked under a scarf or fully zipped jacket.  It does the same for my husbands big head.

Some of the stitching does show through on the side and is a stark white, so for me, as a perfectionist, it stands out like a sore thumb.  It may not be like this for everyone though and may not stand out for everyone as it does for me.  I would have preferred to see a gray thread to go with a gray fleece.  It doesn't make the hood function any different.  It's just my preference.

I am giving this 5 stars because for what it is, it will definitely keep you warmer in the cold winter months and will stand up to time really well.

I did receive this face mask for free in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.
summary: Perfect for the winter that is about to come!

reviewText:
This Thermal Fleece Balaclava Hood is really a very useful piece of clothing in Michigan winters.  I live in Florida but my adult son always freezes in the winter and is always complaining about how his face freezes.  The over the face design is unique and the fleece material is warm and really nice.  It is a very good quality and definitely not cheaply made.  A good deal even at a much higher price.  With the elastic adjustments on the sides you don't need to worry about the back sliding up over the ears or falling down on the front side.  It is soft, warm and my son loves it.  He sometimes teases that he wants to wear it to bed.  It stays in place and doesn't slide off or twist/turn while being worn even in strong winds.  He really likes it.
I purchased this product for a reduced price in exchange for my doing an honest and unbiased review.  Let me tell you, after actually receiving and examining it I am very comfortable in recommending this product and my son is grateful for having it.
summary: This Thermal Fleece Balaclava Hood is really a very useful piece of clothing in Michigan winters

reviewText: This hat is amazing at keeping wind off the face during windy winter days. It stays on and isn't too big or small, and fits as I'd expect such a hat to fit. The hat goes down to right above the base of my neck, so it covers my neck but air can get underneath it, so a scarf would be needed as well unless you used store bought fleece to extend it (which is a cheap fix I'd recommend because the hat is really nice). I added some details to mine to turn it into a fish and I love it! :D

We will be moving to Saskatchewan at the end of December so I am planning to wear this with a wool beanie underneath. The only cons I have noticed so far with the balaclavas is that they smelled strongly of something like engine oil (as other reviewers mentioned) and the back of the balaclava does not give the neck coverage. If you are looking at the photo you will notice the front of the balaclava hangs down a bit but the back does not. I think this would be more effective if it covered the back of the neck.
